structure.unit: PAYMENT, COLLECTION, AND REFUND OF TAXES

law.history: Repealed 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 10, sec. 71, effective January 1, 2010. -- Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 251, effective June 20, 2005. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 4114h-11, 4114h-14.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Tax is personal debt of person liable for payment -- Collection -- Penalties -- Personal checks.
